mapper.select: select cm.subject_code, st.subject_class, cm.subject_name, cm.professor_name, am.score from confirmed_mst as cm left outer join student_mst as sm on(sm.student_id = cm.student_id) left outer join subject_mst as st on(st.subject_code = cm.subject_code) left outer join assessment_mst as am on(am.subject_code = cm.subject_code) where sm.user_id = #{userId}
